summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were mostly lower on Wednesday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: Feb. 22
content:
Bitcoin mining stocks were mostly lower on Wednesday.<br data-v-f87c67ca="">
<br data-v-f87c67ca="">
Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were mostly lower on Wednesday, with three gaining and 15 declining in share price.
Bitcoin fell 2.8% to $23,801 by market close.
